titleStmt.title: A third and fourth part of Pegasus: taught by Bankes his ghost to dance in the Dorick moode, to the tune of Lachrymæ. In two letters from Oxford, July 1. 1648.
Pegasus. Part 3-4.
titleStmt.author: Pierce, Thomas, 1622-1691.

notesStmt.note: Signed p.6: Basilius Philomusus (i.e. Thomas Pierce).--Cf. Madan 1988.
Place of publication and bookseller from Madan.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
